title: Gravel Racing, Wild West Style: Stetina’s Paydirt Showcases the True Spirit of Gravel
content:
As gravel becomes more serious, Stetina’s Paydirt is a reminder to the gravel community to keep things fun.

Read the full article at Gravel Racing, Wild West Style: Stetina’s Paydirt Showcases the True Spirit of Gravel on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
